scripts.lint:fix: cargo fmt && cd ./example && npm run lint:fix
scripts.build:x86: RUSTFLAGS='-C target-feature=+crt-static -C linker=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-gcc' cargo build -p http_server --release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.deploy:http: npm run build:x86 && rm -rf .temp && mkdir .temp && cp ./target/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/http_server ./.temp/bootstrap
